com.cmput301.cs.project.utils

Class LocalClaimSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301.cs.project.utils.LocalClaimSaver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockClaimSaves

    public abstract class LocalClaimSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to save claims via saveAllClaims()

    It can be used by calling ofAndroid(Context)

      • getInputStreamForReading

        protected abstract java.io.InputStream getInputStreamForReading(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Obtain the InputStream for reading the JSON string. Multiple calls should not return the same stream as it might have been closed externally.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to read
        Returns:
        the stream; must not be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - fails to obtain the stream; could mean file does not exists (FileNotFoundException).

      • getOutputStreamForSaving

        protected abstract java.io.OutputStream getOutputStreamForSaving(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Obtain the OutputStream for writing the JSON string. Multiple calls should not return the same stream as it might have been closed externally.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file to save
        Returns:
        the stream; must not be null
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - fails to obtain the stream; could mean file is in use

      • saveAllClaims

        public boolean saveAllClaims(java.lang.Iterable<Claim> claims)
        Saves all the claims to the file CLAIMS_FILE_NAME. Overwrites the previous contents in the file.
        Parameters:
        claims - non-null instance of an Iterable
        Returns:
        if the operation is successful

      • readAllClaims

        public java.util.List<Claim> readAllClaims()
        Reads all the Claims in the file CLAIMS_FILE_NAME, in the same order in the file. The returned list is safe to be modified.
        Returns:
        a list of Claims in the file; otherwise, an empty list if the file does not exist; never null
